璘字的基本解释

璘
lín
玉的光彩。

璘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lín］
［《廣韻》力珍切，平真，來。］
(1)玉的光彩。参见“璘”。
(2)见“璘藉”。

璘字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　璘； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页741第36
【廣韻】力珍切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】離珍切，?音鄰。【玉篇】璘㻞，文貌。　又【韻會】通作瞵。【揚雄·甘泉賦】壁馬犀之瞵㻞。【註】文貌。【古樂府·董逃行】遙望五嶽端，黃金爲闕班璘，但見芝草，葉落紛紛。　又【玉篇】玉色光彩。【張衡·西京賦】瓀珉璘彬。【註】璘彬，玉光色雜也。　又【集韻】【韻會】里忍切【正韻】良忍切，?音粦。義同。　又【韻補】叶陵延切，音連。【皇甫謐·釋勸】忽金白之輝耀，忘靑紫之斑璘。辭容服之光燦，抱敝褐之終年。【正字通】瞵璘音同義別。詩賦凡瞵㻞斑瞵，皆璘字譌文。韻會引揚雄賦通作瞵，誤。㻞字原从目从扁。

璘字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
璘字的起名意思

：指玉的光彩，引申为有文采的样子。

["Guang Yun", cherish and cut it, plain, come. ]

[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　璘; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 741 36
[Guang Yun] Li Zhen cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Leaving Zhen cut,? Yin neighbor. 【Jade articles】Lin 㻞, text and appearance.　[Rhyme Club] Tong Zuo Liao. 【Yang Xiong·Ganquan Fu】Liu 㻞 of wall horse rhinoceros. [Note] Literary appearance. [Guyuefu·Dong Escape] Looking at the five mountains in the distance, the gold is Que Pan Ling, but when I see Zhicao, the leaves are falling.　[Jade articles] Jade color and brilliance. 【Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu】Gun Min Bin Bin. [Note] Lin Bin has mixed colors and jade.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui] Li Renqie [Zheng Yun] Liang Renqie,? Yin 粦. The same meaning.　[Rhyme Supplement] Ye Ling cuts, the sound is continuous. 【Huangfu Mi·Shiquan】Suddenly the golden and white brilliance, forget the purple spot. The radiance of Ci Rongfu is shining, and the year-round embraces the brown. [Zhengzitong] 瞵璘音 is synonymous. The poems and verses where 瞵㻞瞵瞵 are all 璘字譌文. The rhyme will lead Yang Xiong Fu to make a mistake. The word 㻞 was originally from the head from the flat.
